price: Isipo kuwa kikongwe katika walio kaa nyuma.
footnotes: Ila mkewe kizee aliye baki, na hakutoka nao. Yeye akaangamia kwa kufuru zake na ukhaini wake, kwa kuwaunga mkono wakosefu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
